results.author: Sachi Mulkey
results.title: The Cause of the LA Fires Might Never Be Known—but AI Is Hunting for Clues
results.description: The source of more than half of all wildfires in the Western US remains unknown, so the US Forest Service has teamed up with computer scientists to create tools that can find answers.
results.content: Karen Short, a research ecologist with the Forest Service who contributed to the study and maintains a historical database of national wildfire reports, says understanding why they start is essential… [+3060 chars]

results.author: Hannah Singleton
results.title: How Invasive Plants Are Fueling California’s Wildfire Crisis
results.description: Non-native grasses and eucalyptus trees brought to California centuries ago for agriculture and landscaping have reshaped the state’s fire dynamics.
results.content: Fire has always shaped the landscape in California. But today it burns hotter, more frequently, and spreads further than ever beforea shift driven by human development, climate change, and the preval… [+3282 chars]

results.author: Justine Calma
results.title: Bill Gates’ nuclear energy startup inks new data center deal
results.description: Bill Gates’ nuclear energy startup, TerraPower inked a major deal with one of the largest data center developers in the US as tech companies turn to nuclear energy to power AI.
